name: Inhertiance
explained: Inheritance is when a class inherits behavior from another class. The class that is inheriting behavior is called the subclass and the class it inherits from is called the superclass. We use inheritance as a way to extract common behaviors from classes that share that behavior, and move it to a superclass.

name: Arrays
explained: In computer science, an array data structure, or simply an array, is a data structure consisting of a collection of elements, each identified by at least one array index or key. An array is stored such that the position of each element can be computed from its index tuple by a mathematical formula.
